issue.title: [R][Packaging] Build binaries with devtoolset 8 on CentOS 7
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17594](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17594). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
ARROW-17545 switches Arrow C++ to require C++17, which does not compile with the CentOS 7 system compiler. The corresponding build was disabled and needs to be reenabled with the devtoolset activated.
